text: The 2017 Sultan Ibrahim Cup is an international football competition, the 1st edition of the tournament. It was a group tournament, with all matches held Malaysia. ==Teams== ;CAFF * * * * * * ;AFF * (host) * (Invited) ==Draw== The teams were seeded according to their performance in the Sultan Ibrahim Cup. {| class="wikitable" style="width:80%;" |- !width=25%|Pot 1 !width=25%|Pot 2 !width=25%|Pot 3 !width=25%|Pot 4 |- | | | | |} ==References== Category:2017 in Asian football
title: 2017 Sultan Ibrahim Cup
